word: You need an intelligent belief in the Word of God. This Word is our rule of action. You are not to stand long, saying, "What must I do?" The first question with you is, "What must I believe?" Right believing means right doing. Christ gave His life to make it possible for you to be a partaker of the divine nature. . . . Remember that the Lord will bless all who put their trust in Him. Your sister, Ellen G. White.--Letter 159, June 11, 1905, to a "discouraged church member."
